properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 3:20PM CST until February 13 at 1:50PM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

Sister Grove Creek Near Blue Ridge Affecting Collin County

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Sister Grove Creek Near Blue Ridge.
* until Thursday afternoon...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 0300 PM Wednesday the stage was 22.91 feet.
* Flood stage is 24.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by late
Wednesday afternoon and continue to rise to a crest near 25 feet
by Wednesday evening. The river should fall below flood stage
Thursday morning.
* At 24 feet, Minor out of bank flooding along the creek is expected.
Rural roads, along with farm and ranch land near the creek, will
begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
